name: Triassic Bork
description:
A PICO-8 fan game about one of the best known episodes of a popular futuristic animated show. This is a game about waiting for the future to arrive.

music inspired by Foreigner "Waiting For A Girl Like You."

I will probably add at least a proper intro screen. I might add a desert bus type scoring mechanic and make it kind of a tamagotchi thing, but again this is a game about waiting.
